ygData.subject: a few kaesora questions
ygData.msgSnippet: anyone know where the strathbone shell shield in kaesora drops, i have a couple friends that would love to get their hands on it, im assuming the spiders but
ygData.messageBody:
anyone know where the strathbone shell shield in kaesora drops, i have a
couple friends that would love to get their hands on it, im assuming the
spiders but dunno.

Was in there last night trying to get the stupid fang, took us 2 hours to
get to the rest of the gang down there waiting for him to spawn (they were
down there 6 hours and got 3 fangs only) and we were there a couple hours
and only 1 spawned.

On the bright side, got some truesilver boots (AC11)from a ravener for my
bard (he's only got steel booties on) and we all got a ransackers pack (25%
weight reduction) from spectral guardians. We got lost big time in there,
its a very cool layout for a dungeon and was fun running around lost in it,
seems very big, we killed a librarian and got a tome (6int 6 wis) and
basically ran around killing everything in sight.

But anyways, thats not the main reason i writing this email, my main
question is where do i go to get the coin (and whats it from) from the
xolvarg or wahtever he's called and also, what the hell is a Spectral
Pestle for from the spectral guardians.... they're no drop and alakazams has
no info on it.

One last question, anything else i should pick up while im there?

-Minkin 37 bard
-Rakka 52 necro <-- he's camping the place as its easier for him then the
bard

P.S. I love that cattana song, the bard i was with yesterday kept me and the
wizard full mana and i was nuking like a maniac, especially that it stacks
with lich form
